title: Paper straw packed inside plastic : r/mildlyinfuriating - Reddit
body: Virtue signaling: Level 1000. Its only useless when you order a milkshake and the entire cup is made out of plastic but the straw is from paper. Nah bud it's cellulose triacetate plants will eat that trust me. "No more plastic straws in paper, just paper straws in plastic" - Tom McDonald.
